00063 static DdNode * ddFindEssentialRecur ARGS((DdManager *dd, DdNode *f));

00088 DdNode *
00089 Cudd_FindEssential(
00090   DdManager * dd,
00091   DdNode * f)
00092 {
00093     DdNode *res;
00094 
00095     do {
00096         dd->reordered = 0;
00097         res = ddFindEssentialRecur(dd,f);
00098     } while (dd->reordered == 1);
00099     return(res);
00100 
00101 } /* end of Cudd_FindEssential */

00118 int
00119 Cudd_bddIsVarEssential(
00120   DdManager * manager,
00121   DdNode * f,
00122   int  id,
00123   int  phase)
00124 {
00125     DdNode      *var;
00126     int         res;
00127     DdNode      *one, *zero;
00128 
00129     one = DD_ONE(manager);
00130     zero = Cudd_Not(one);
00131 
00132     var = cuddUniqueInter(manager, id, one, zero);
00133 
00134     var = Cudd_NotCond(var,phase == 0);
00135 
00136     res = Cudd_bddIteConstant(manager, Cudd_Not(f), one, var) == one;
00137 
00138     return(res);
00139 
00140 } /* end of Cudd_bddIsVarEssential */

00163 static DdNode *
00164 ddFindEssentialRecur(
00165   DdManager * dd,
00166   DdNode * f)
00167 {
00168     DdNode      *T, *E, *F;
00169     DdNode      *essT, *essE, *res;
00170     int         index;
00171     DdNode      *one, *lzero, *azero;
00172 
00173     one = DD_ONE(dd);
00174     F = Cudd_Regular(f);
00175     /* If f is constant the set of essential variables is empty. */
00176     if (cuddIsConstant(F)) return(one);
00177 
00178     res = cuddCacheLookup1(dd,Cudd_FindEssential,f);
00179     if (res != NULL) {
00180         return(res);
00181     }
00182 
00183     lzero = Cudd_Not(one);
00184     azero = DD_ZERO(dd);
00185     /* Find cofactors: here f is non-constant. */
00186     T = cuddT(F);
00187     E = cuddE(F);
00188     if (Cudd_IsComplement(f)) {
00189         T = Cudd_Not(T); E = Cudd_Not(E);
00190     }
00191 
00192     index = F->index;
00193     if (Cudd_IsConstant(T) && T != lzero && T != azero) {
00194         /* if E is zero, index is essential, otherwise there are no
00195         ** essentials, because index is not essential and no other variable
00196         ** can be, since setting index = 1 makes the function constant and
00197         ** different from 0.
00198         */
00199         if (E == lzero || E == azero) {
00200             res = dd->vars[index];
00201         } else {
00202             res = one;
00203         }
00204     } else if (T == lzero || T == azero) {
00205         if (Cudd_IsConstant(E)) { /* E cannot be zero here */
00206             res = Cudd_Not(dd->vars[index]);
00207         } else { /* E == non-constant */
00208             /* find essentials in the else branch */
00209             essE = ddFindEssentialRecur(dd,E);
00210             if (essE == NULL) {
00211                 return(NULL);
00212             }
00213             cuddRef(essE);
00214 
00215             /* add index to the set with negative phase */
00216             res = cuddUniqueInter(dd,index,one,Cudd_Not(essE));
00217             if (res == NULL) {
00218                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,essE);
00219                 return(NULL);
00220             }
00221             res = Cudd_Not(res);
00222             cuddDeref(essE);
00223         }
00224     } else { /* T == non-const */
00225         if (E == lzero || E == azero) {
00226             /* find essentials in the then branch */
00227             essT = ddFindEssentialRecur(dd,T);
00228             if (essT == NULL) {
00229                 return(NULL);
00230             }
00231             cuddRef(essT);
00232 
00233             /* add index to the set with positive phase */
00234             /* use And because essT may be complemented */
00235             res = cuddBddAndRecur(dd,dd->vars[index],essT);
00236             if (res == NULL) {
00237                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,essT);
00238                 return(NULL);
00239             }
00240             cuddDeref(essT);
00241         } else if (!Cudd_IsConstant(E)) {
00242             /* if E is a non-zero constant there are no essentials
00243             ** because T is non-constant.
00244             */
00245             essT = ddFindEssentialRecur(dd,T);
00246             if (essT == NULL) {
00247                 return(NULL);
00248             }
00249             if (essT == one) {
00250                 res = one;
00251             } else {
00252                 cuddRef(essT);
00253                 essE = ddFindEssentialRecur(dd,E);
00254                 if (essE == NULL) {
00255                     Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,essT);
00256                     return(NULL);
00257                 }
00258                 cuddRef(essE);
00259 
00260                 /* res = intersection(essT, essE) */
00261                 res = cuddBddLiteralSetIntersectionRecur(dd,essT,essE);
00262                 if (res == NULL) {
00263                     Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,essT);
00264                     Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,essE);
00265                     return(NULL);
00266                 }
00267                 cuddRef(res);
00268                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,essT);
00269                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,essE);
00270                 cuddDeref(res);
00271             }
00272         } else {        /* E is a non-zero constant */
00273             res = one;
00274         }
00275     }
00276 
00277     cuddCacheInsert1(dd,Cudd_FindEssential, f, res);
00278     return(res);
00279 
00280 } /* end of ddFindEssentialRecur */
